alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Lucie, southeastern Okeechobee, southeastern Indian River and Martin Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Fort Pierce Inlet to near Palmdale. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Walton, Fort Pierce, Stuart and Vero Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
